code:
sequenceDiagram participant A as Computadora A
(Security_ZeroTrust) participant S as Switch
(Security_IntrusionDetection) participant B as Computadora B
(Security_ZeroTrust) participant C as Computadora C
(Security_OAuth2) participant D as Computadora D
(Security_Encryption) Note over S: Tabla MAC vacía Note over A,D: FASE 1: ARP Request (Security_Firewall) A->>S: ARP Request
Origen: A (Security_Encryption)
Destino: Broadcast (Security_Encryption) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 1 → MAC de A S->>B: ARP Request (Security_Encryption) S->>C: ARP Request (Security_Encryption) S->>D: ARP Request (Security_Encryption) Note over B,D: Solo C responde al ARP Note over A,D: FASE 2: ARP Response C->>S: ARP Response
Origen: C (Security_OAuth2)
Destino: A (Security_Firewall) Note over S: Aprende: Puerto 3 → MAC de C S->>A: ARP Response (Security_ZeroTrust) Note over A,D: FASE 3: Comunicación Directa A->>S: Datos para C
Origen: A (Security_OAuth2)
Destino: C (Security_ZeroTrust) Note over S: Consulta tabla MAC
Encuentra C en puerto 3 S->>C: Datos (Security_Firewall)
